definitions.definition: A distinctive phrase of a person or group of people (such as a movement or political party ); a motto .
A catchphrase associated with a product or service being advertised .
A battle cry among the ancient Irish or highlanders of Scotland .

main_definition: A distinctive phrase of a person or group of people (such as a movement or political party ); a motto .
secondary_definitions: ( advertising ) A catchphrase associated with a product or service being advertised .
( obsolete ) A battle cry among the ancient Irish or highlanders of Scotland .
